The claim alleges that the police and a: 2. The claim is accompanied by a video showing a woman and a man in flames, as well as a screenshot of the video.
The claim was shared on Twitter and Face: with the post being shared close to 8000 times since it was posted on September 5.
Alt News conducted a fact: check and found that the narrative accompanying the video is false, and the incident actually occurred in Mathura, UP, where a couple attempted self-immolation at a police station due to harassment and police inaction.
